about.title: Professional Logistics
about.description: Modern Sea Live olarak, FCL ve LCL konteyner nakliyesi, multimodal transport çözümleri ve comprehensive customs clearance hizmetleriyle global freight forwarding sektöründe lider konumdayız.

feature1.title: Global Network
feature1.description: Dünya çapında shipping lines ve logistics partners ağımızla seamless freight forwarding operations sağlıyoruz.

feature2.title: Expert Team
feature2.description: Deneyimli freight forwarders ekibimiz ile Bill of Lading, MAWB ve TIR documentation süreçlerinizi profesyonelce yönetiyoruz.

feature3.title: Technology
feature3.description: Advanced tracking systems ve digital freight management platformları ile shipment visibility ve operational efficiency sağlıyoruz.

services.title: Comprehensive Logistics
services.description: Professional freight forwarding services across all transportation modes with comprehensive supply chain management and customs clearance expertise.

oceanFreight.title: Ocean Freight
oceanFreight.description: FCL ve LCL konteyner nakliyesi, Bill of Lading düzenleme ve port handling hizmetleri.

airFreight.title: Air Freight
airFreight.description: Express air cargo, MAWB düzenleme ve hızlı customs clearance çözümleri.

roadFreight.title: Road Freight
roadFreight.description: Cross-border transport, TIR karnesi ve Avrupa-Asya arası overland taşımacılık.

warehousing.title: Warehousing
warehousing.description: Bonded warehouse, cargo consolidation ve distribution center yönetimi.

cta.title: Tailored Freight Solutions
cta.description: Every shipment is unique. Our freight forwarding experts design customized logistics solutions that meet your specific requirements.
